function_call.name: get_risks
function_call.arguments: {"risks":[{"Description":"Lack of preventive measures for COVID-19","Impact":"Increased spread of the disease","Mitigation":"Implementation of strict preventive measures such as social distancing, mask-wearing, and hygiene practices","Technologies":"IoT for contact tracing, AI for data analysis, Robotics for automation of tasks","People":"General population","Owner":"Government and public health organizations"},{"Description":"Large-scale research and development efforts for vaccines and treatments","Impact":"Resource strain and potential lack of coordination","Mitigation":"Collaboration and coordination between research entities, allocation of resources for efficient research","Technologies":"Blockchain for data transparency and collaboration, AI for drug discovery","People":"Scientists, researchers, and laboratories","Owner":"Research organizations and funding bodies"},{"Description":"Inadequate clinical understanding of COVID-19","Impact":"Delay in effective diagnosis and treatment","Mitigation":"Investment in clinical research and testing, dissemination of information to healthcare professionals","Technologies":"IoT for remote monitoring, AI for data analysis, and prediction","People":"Healthcare professionals and researchers","Owner":"Medical research institutions"}]}
